coin_increase.description: Increase money earned by killing enemies by 20%

exp_increase.description: Increase exp point earned by killing enemies by 20%

fireball_damage.description: Increase the damage of fireballs by 20%

max_hp.description: Increase the max hp of the hero by 30

movement_speed.description: Increase the movement speed of the hero by 20%

mp_recovery.description: Increase the mp recovery rate by 30%

second_life.description: Automatically recovery all hp and mp when hero dies for the first time in a game
